channel.title: Dramatic 508 ~ Cool features; New Source ~
channel.description:
Hello to start off this is a project i have been workin on a while (credits to Jean-Luc and Saucten-Xchia)
The reason why im releasing this is because i co-owned it with a guy, He did'nt like it when i worked on project's so he raged at me,also he got players to Dos me so :L here it is
This means...NO ANTI-LEECH Do anything with this server and have fun
This base is compatible with the following: -DSPK -Project Insanity (And all other affiliated releases)
Credits: Jean-luc - 25% Saucten-xchia - 30% Myself(AKA Gabe Miller; Gmres12)- 55%
Honourable Mentions: Max Willington
The Features Include... -602 Skill Interface -Fading Hitmarks -All Important Summoning Special Attacks -Very Advanced Dicing System -Nomad -Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking -Wilderness Revernants -Elite Slayer Tasks -All NPC's around the World -More Advanaced Skilling than PI -FULLY working Overloads 100% RS -Unique Custom Home -Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! (Like RS -100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)! -PKP Shops -90% Corrected Item Stats -Even More NPC Anims Added -Player Owned Shops -Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded -PERFECT Bridding / Switching -Vote4Cash Integrated -Fully Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape & More Items Added -Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect's) -Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat) -Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated -Instant Loading (Was very slow with base) -Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects -Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces -317 Classic RS Graphics -Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces -NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE -Working Spirit Shield Effects -Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects -Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields -NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED -602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters -Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother! -Donaters FUNPK Area -Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding) -Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP -Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server -Near Flawless Combat System -Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow
Screenies: :D
[img]http://img641.imageshack.us/img641/3769/31bb7bd6072b406b8977622.png[/img]
[img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/3449/b8b70656c2954d89b06767f.png[/img]
[img]http://img191.imageshack.us/img191/4281/ca5478dbc5cd4352a2041a2.png[/img]
[img]http://img440.imageshack.us/img440/9186/3cc4baf3f6dc4dda82d01d9.png[/img]
[img]http://img41.imageshack.us/img41/3530/e65788e4dca041989499582.png[/img]
[img]http://img824.imageshack.us/img824/1368/863323a08e164956b7e7598.png[/img]
--------------Download LINK :D ---------------
I hope you like ta source! :D
~ GMRES12

item.title: Dramatic 508 ~ Cool features; New Source ~
item.dc:creator: @gmres12 gmres12
item.description:
@gmres12 wrote:

Hello to start off this is a project i have been workin on a while (credits to Jean-Luc and Saucten-Xchia)

The reason why im releasing this is because i co-owned it with a guy, He did’nt like it when i worked on project’s so he raged at me,also he got players to Dos me so :L here it is

This means…NO ANTI-LEECH
Do anything with this server and have fun

This base is compatible with the following:
-DSPK
-Project Insanity
(And all other affiliated releases)

Credits:
Jean-luc - 25%
Saucten-xchia - 30%
Myself(AKA Gabe Miller; Gmres12)- 55%

Honourable Mentions:
Max Willington

The Features Include…
-602 Skill Interface
-Fading Hitmarks
-All Important Summoning Special Attacks
-Very Advanced Dicing System
-Nomad
-Introduction of Red Dragons, Very Active Pking
-Wilderness Revernants
-Elite Slayer Tasks
-All NPC’s around the World
-More Advanaced Skilling than PI
-FULLY working Overloads 100% RS
-Unique Custom Home
-Dragonfireshield works 100% Charging! (Like RS
-100% Working pvp armours ( Statius, Vesta, Zuriel and Morrigan)!
-PKP Shops
-90% Corrected Item Stats
-Even More NPC Anims Added
-Player Owned Shops
-Sarabrew doesnt drain stats when overloaded
-PERFECT Bridding / Switching
-Vote4Cash Integrated
-Fully Webclient Ready
-Soulwars Cape & More Items Added
-Torva, Korasi, Primal (With Effect’s)
-Critical Hits (With RS Hitsplat)
-Fixed Slayer NPC Perfectly Animated and Updated
-Instant Loading (Was very slow with base)
-Ring of Life & Slayer Helmet Effects
-Brilliant Custom Designed Interfaces
-317 Classic RS Graphics
-Custom Desgined GWD with Interfaces
-NEW RS AUTOCAST FEATURE
-Working Spirit Shield Effects
-Hand Cannon, Arcane Stream, Ring of Vigour Effects
-Dungeoneering Skillcape Emotes, Chaotic Shields
-NO DUPES, ALL BUGS FIXED
-602 Animations, 602 GFX, 474 Maps, 614 Items, 317 Characters
-Enhanced GFX Rendering Looks Smoother!
-Donaters FUNPK Area
-Perfect RS Hand Cannon Fixed Anti Leech (Commented out Exploding)
-Perfect Constitution x10 Hits and HP
-Very accurate Special Calcs for PvP Server
-Near Flawless Combat System
-Perfect RS Chaotic Crossbow

Screenies:

I hope you like ta source!

~ GMRES12
